clone

public abstract E clone()
Description copied from interface: Element
Return a deep clone of this element. The returned element has no parent.

linearContext

public LookupStrategy linearContext()
                             throws LookupException
The linear lookup strategy of a statement is the lookup strategy used for the element that comes next in a block. For example, the linear lookup strategy of a variable declaration statement includes the declared variable, while its lexicalContext() method does not. Returns the lexical context by default.

Returns:
Throws:
LookupException
